definition: to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: Check he expiry date for all foam extinguisher.
sentences.chinese: 检查所有泡沫灭火器的过期时间。

sentences.english: They threw eggs, sticks, bottles and a fire extinguisher at the police.
sentences.chinese: 他们向警察投掷了鸡蛋，木棍，酒瓶和一些灭火器。

sentences.english: Portable extinguishers in saloon not in position.
sentences.chinese: 大台的手提式灭火器放的位置不对。

sentences.english: Buy a fire extinguisher to keep outside.
sentences.chinese: 买一个灭火器放到室外。

sentences.english: Portable extinguishers in position and operational.
sentences.chinese: 手提式灭火器在其位并好用。

sentences.english: Portable extinguishers in hold No. 2 not accessible.
sentences.chinese: 放在2舱的手提式灭火器够不着。

sentences.english: The school building is equipped with a lot of fire extinguishers.
sentences.chinese: 教学楼配备了许多灭火器。

sentences.english: There are a number of well - intentioned people used to fight a fire extinguisher.
sentences.chinese: 又有几个好心人拿来灭火器把扑灭了。

sentences.english: With fire-extinguisher function, and not harmful for humans body.
sentences.chinese: 具有灭火器功能且对人体无害。

sentences.english: EMERGENCY】I keep a box of tools and a fire extinguisher in my car for use in an emergency.
sentences.chinese: 我在车中放了工具箱和灭火器，以备紧急之需。

sentences.english: He lifted his extinguisher to put out a flame on some eye - catching fabric.
sentences.chinese: 他举起灭火器，想扑灭一件十分惹眼的织物上的火苗。

sentences.english: A fire extinguisher is a fire-fighting implement.
At the foot of the platform there are four bronze water vats, the ancient form of fire extinguishers.
sentences.chinese: 在山脚下有四个铜水平台大缸，古代的形式，灭火器。

sentences.english: I went down immediately, of course, and that fool, Horst, aimed a fire extinguisher at me.
sentences.chinese: 但那个傻瓜霍斯特把灭火器对准了我。

sentences.english: Fire sprinklers for higher floors and portable fire extinguishers.
sentences.chinese: 更高楼层必需配备消防喷头和便携式灭火器。

sentences.english: It leaves no trace after fire extinguishing. It replaces for alkylogen annihilator.
sentences.chinese: 灭火后不留痕迹，是取代卤代烷灭火器的替代品。
